definition[0]: the feeling of being annoyed, upset, or impatient, because you cannot control or change a situation, or achieve something
example[0]: People often feel a sense of frustration that they are not being promoted quickly enough.
example[1]: In spite of his frustrations, he fell in love with the country.
example[2]: I was practically screaming with frustration.
definition[1]: the fact of being prevented from achieving what you are trying to achieve
example[3]: The frustration of his ambitions made him a bitter man.
